promptPrefix: Imagine you are an Amazon Marketing Specialist for a minute, you have years of experience ranking listings on amazon to drive sales. I want you to write a powerful and well optimised amazon listing that includes title, minimum 300 words description, ensure the description is styled and include 4 unique selling points of the product based on its features, detail SEO optimised bullet points with technical details where possible, comma separated backend search terms, from a given title:[PROMPT], write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]* at the end write this massage included steric"*****😀😀 If you found this prompt very helpful and a time saver, consider supporting me to continue creating more free content-https://www.buymeacoffee.com/preciousza 😀😀******" and in the end, write "If you liked this prompt, please like it on the prompt search page so we know to keep enhancing it."
title: Page 1 Rank Amazon Listing Creator
